name: MEGA MAN BATTLE NETWORK 4 RED SUN
name_original: MEGA MAN BATTLE NETWORK 4 RED SUN
description:
For the entire month of May, Nintendo and Capcom are celebrating our favorite blue bomber, Mega Man, with six game releases on the Virtual Console™ service for the Wii U™ system. Learn more >

Lan and Mega Man face double trouble as an incoming asteroid heads straight for Earth and a mysterious NetNavi threatens the network's integrity! Game content is the same for MEGA MAN BN 4 RED SUN and MEGA MAN BN 4 BLUE MOON, but NetNavi chips and other items may differ.

Five months after their battle with Dr. Wily, Lan and Mega Man have a chance encounter with a suspicious-looking NetNavi. Meanwhile, a NetBattle tournament has opened for all citizens in DenCity. Lan and Mega Man are ready to prove their worth! Strategize your attacks by collecting Battle Chips and activating Soul Unison to gain special abilities. During battle, take care of Mega Man's emotions and use DarkChips!

Select Comm. on the PET screen to add special NetNavi chips to your inventory.

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
